name: Taxonomy.Builders
author: Fulfillment.Global

sections.description:
Customize the WordPress term taxonomy page and enhance functionality by adding new settings.

Features Include

  • Fully Responsive.
  • 100% Multi language.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘taxonomy-builders’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the Taxonomy.Builders plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Add and manage taxonomy from Settings > Taxonomy.Builders Hook Settings in your admin menu.
  4. Create a page with the any name and paste your desired shortcode in that.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • Update – Added Security patches
  • Tweak – Code optimization and performance improvements.
  • Checked compatibility to WordPress version 6.2

1.0

  • Initial release.
